hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPOS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide a comma separated list of repos. If you want the project name to be different then repo name, first provide the name and separate the url with $ sign

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_CREDENTIAL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID of the credentials used to push tags to git repo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_SSH_CREDENTIAL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID of the ssh credentials used to push tags to git repo

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: GIT_USE_SSH_KEY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Should ssh key be used for git

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: JDK_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID of Git installation

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: M2_SETTINGS_REPO_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the server ID in Maven's settings.xml

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO_WITH_BINARIES_FOR_UPLOAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Address to hosted JARs

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO_WITH_BINARIES_CREDENTIAL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Credential ID of repo with binaries

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_EMAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Email used to tag the repo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name used to tag the repo

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TOOLS_REPOSITORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The URL containing pipeline functions repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TOOLS_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch with pipeline functions

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: AUTO_DEPLOY_TO_STAGE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Should deployment to stage be automatic

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: AUTO_DEPLOY_TO_PROD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Should deployment to prod be automatic

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: API_COMPATIBILITY_STEP_REQUIRED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Should api compatibility step be present

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DB_ROLLBACK_STEP_REQUIRED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Should DB rollback step be present

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DEPLOY_TO_STAGE_STEP_REQUIRED
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Should deploy to stage step be present

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Which PAAS do you want to choose

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MYSQL_ROOT_CREDENTIAL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Credential ID of MYSQL root user

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MYSQL_CREDENTIAL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Credential ID of MYSQL user

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_REGISTRY_CREDENTIAL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Credential ID of docker registry

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_SERVER_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Docker Server ID

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_EMAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Email used to connect to Docker registry

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_REGISTRY_ORGANIZATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL to Kubernetes cluster for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_REGISTRY_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL to the docker registry

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PIPELINE_DESCRIPTOR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the pipeline descriptor. If none is set then `sc-pipelines.yml` will be assumed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_API_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL to Kubernetes cluster for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_API_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL to Kubernetes cluster for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_API_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL to Kubernetes cluster for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_CA_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Certificate Authority location for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_CA_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Certificate Authority location for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_CA_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Certificate Authority location for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_CLIENT_CERT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Client Certificate location for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_CLIENT_CERT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Client Certificate location for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_CLIENT_CERT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Client Certificate location for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_CLIENT_KEY_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Client Key location for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_CLIENT_KEY_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Client Key location for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_CLIENT_KEY_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Client Key location for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_CLIENT_TOKEN_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to the file containing the token for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_CLIENT_TOKEN_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to the file containing the token for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_CLIENT_TOKEN_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to the file containing the token for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_CLIENT_TOKEN_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID of the credentials containing a token used by Kubectl for test env. Takes precedence over client key

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_CLIENT_TOKEN_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID of the credentials containing a token used by Kubectl for stage env. Takes precedence over client key

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_CLIENT_TOKEN_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ID of the credentials containing a token used by Kubectl for prod env. Takes precedence over client key

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_CLUSTER_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the cluster for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_CLUSTER_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the cluster for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_CLUSTER_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the cluster for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_CLUSTER_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Username for the cluster for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_CLUSTER_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Username for the cluster for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_CLUSTER_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Username for the cluster for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_SYSTEM_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name for the system for test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_SYSTEM_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name for the system for stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_SYSTEM_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name for the system for prod env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_TEST_NAMESPACE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Namespace for the test env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_STAGE_NAMESPACE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Namespace for the stage env

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PAAS_PROD_NAMESPACE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Namespace for the prod env
